import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import SearchBox from'../components/SearchBox';import'./App.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[numberFact,setNumberFact]=useState('');const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const fetchNumberFact=async number=>{try{setLoading(true);const response=await fetch("http://numbersapi.com/".concat(number,"/trivia"));const data=await response.text();setNumberFact(data);setLoading(false);}catch(error){console.log(error);setLoading(false);}};const handleSearch=number=>{if(number.trim()!==''){fetchNumberFact(number);}};const handleRandom=()=>{fetchNumberFact('random');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"tc",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"f1",children:"Number Facts"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SearchBox,{onSearch:handleSearch,onRandom:handleRandom}),loading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Loading..."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:numberFact.trim()!==''?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"f2 fw6 mb3",children:numberFact}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Type a number and press Enter or click Random to get a fact about it"})})]});}export default App;
